data.name: MessageShiftNotSaved
data.value: The shift could not be saved.

data.name: MessageScheduleNotSaved
data.value: The schedule could not be saved.

data.name: MessageScheduleCopied
data.value: The schedule was successfully copied to week {0} of {1}.

data.name: MessageScheduleNotEmpty
data.value: The selected schedule already contains shifts.

data.name: MessageWeekNotExists
data.value: The selected week does not exist.

data.name: MessageScheduleNotApproved
data.value: The schedule could not be approved.

data.name: MessageScheduleEmpty
data.value: The schedule does not contain any shifts.

data.name: MessageOfferNotAdopted
data.value: The selected shift could not be adopted.

data.name: MessageOfferAdopted
data.value: The selected shift was successfully adopted.

data.name: MessageShiftNotOffered
data.value: The state of the shift could not be set to offered.

data.name: MessageShiftOffered
data.value: The state of the shift was successfully set to offered.

data.name: MessageOfferCanceled
data.value: The selected shift is successfully removed from the offers.

data.name: MessageShiftNotDeleted
data.value: The selected shift could not be deleted.

data.name: MessageShiftContainsWorkedShift
data.value: The selected shift could not be deleted because the employee already worked this shift.

data.name: MessageShiftDeleted
data.value: The selected shift was successfully deleted.
